arStrings.szText: Number of times moved through an enemy

While {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} is active you gain {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} to all Non-Physical Resistances and reduce the duration of incoming Control Impairing Effects by {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%|]{/c} .
Damaging an enemy with {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%+|]{/c} Movement Speed while {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} is active, up to {c_number}[{SF_8}*{SF_15}*100|%+|]{/c}.

Moving through enemies while {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} is active refreshes its duration. After moving through enemies {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} times, your next {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} will {c_important}{u}Daze{/u}{/c} enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_DAZE}{/c} seconds.
